actions.subcommittee: Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

official_title: To amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 respecting the participation in or attendance of operators at interviews conducted in connection with an investigation of an accident.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to prohibit a mine operator from participating in or attending any interview of an employee with respect to any accident investigation of the mine operation conducted by the Secretary of the Interior.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 respecting the participation in or attendance of operators at interviews conducted in connection with an investigation of an accident.
